sentences.en: A bar of iron is solid; a pipe is hollow.
sentences.cn: 铁棍是实心的, 而管子是空心的.

sentences.en: a hollow tree
sentences.cn: 空心树

sentences.en: A iron bar is solid; a pipe is hollow.
sentences.cn: 铁条是实心的, 管子是空心的.

sentences.en: A thin, hollow needle was carefully introduced into the patient's abdomen.
sentences.cn: 一根细空心针被小心地插入病人腹部.

sentences.en: All the units employ hollow burned - clay blocks as the basic raw material.
sentences.cn: 所有构件都用空心陶土砖做基本原料.

sentences.en: Any threat to bring in the police is a hollow one.
sentences.cn: 任何要叫警察来的威胁都是虚张声势。

sentences.en: Bake some big red peppers and hollow them out.
sentences.cn: 将几个大红甜椒烤一烤，再把它们掏空。

sentences.en: Below him the town lay warm in the hollow of the hill.
sentences.cn: 在他下方，小镇卧在温暖的山谷里。

sentences.en: He gave a hollow laugh.
sentences.cn: 他发出低沉空洞的笑声.

sentences.en: He looked young, dark and sharp-featured, with hollow cheeks.
sentences.cn: 他看起来很年轻，肤色黝黑，五官分明，双颊凹陷。

sentences.en: Hollow out the cake and fill it with cream.
sentences.cn: 在蛋糕上挖个洞，填入奶油。

sentences.en: I felt empty and hollow; defeated.
sentences.cn: 我感觉空虚无聊，充满挫败感。

sentences.en: I made my home there, in the hollow of a dying elm.
sentences.cn: 我在一棵快要枯死的榆树的树洞里安了家。

sentences.en: If you can imagine Jupiter AS a hollow ball, all of the other planets would fit inside and there would still be a lot of room left.
sentences.cn: 你是否能想象木星如同一个空的球，那么把所有的其它行星都放到里面，它仍然还剩有许多空间。

sentences.en: More gravel is needed to fill the hollow in the drive.
sentences.cn: 需要更多的砾石来填平车道上的坑洼.

sentences.en: She looked old and thin with sunken cheeks and hollow eyes.
sentences.cn: 她看上去又老又瘦,脸颊凹陷,眼圈发黑.

sentences.en: The boys scraped out a hollow place for planting trees.
sentences.cn: 那些孩子挖了个坑准备栽树.

sentences.en: The ersatz spontaneity of "Sunday Love" sounds especially hollow.
sentences.cn: 对《星期天的爱情》这首歌的即兴模仿听起来尤其空洞。

sentences.en: The steps were hollowed by centuries of use.
sentences.cn: 经过几个世纪的踩踏，台阶上出现了凹痕

sentences.en: The tree trunk was hollow inside.
sentences.cn: 这树干里面是空的。

phrases.tran_cn: 完全（或彻底）击败（或超过）某人
混凝土空心砌块；空心混凝土砖；水泥空心砖
空心混凝土；多孔混凝土；大孔隙混凝土
话听起来不诚恳；话语听着空洞

trans.tran_cn: 空的，空洞的，虚伪的，空腹的

trans.tran_en: to make a hole or empty space by removing the inside part of something

trans.tran_cn: 挖空（某物），变空，挖出（孔、洞）
